name: Mango Tree
description: A fast-growing tropical tree that produces delicious, juicy mangoes during summer. Its dense green canopy provides ample shade.

name: Guava Tree
description: Hardy and productive, guava trees yield vitamin-rich fruits and thrive in warm, humid climates.

name: Neem Tree
description: A traditional medicinal tree known for its air-purifying qualities and natural pest-repellent properties.

name: Banyan Tree
description: Majestic and long-lived, banyan trees offer expansive shade and become living landmarks in communities.
